structured_data.Name: Manjot Singh
structured_data.Experience: Supply chain professional with more than 5 years of experience in handling end to end supply chain processes, including control tower operations, operations planning, inventory control, procurement, managing fulfillment center/warehouse operations, logistics operations and process improvement. EXPERIENCE 09/2022 – PRESENT ASSISTANT MANAGER - PAN INDIA SPARES OPERATIONS , SPINNY • Contributed to building the spares supply chain network across India . • Lead the continuous improvement of spares inventory processes, store operations , parts procurement while cultivating relationships with partners and suppliers. • Managed the workflow for stores across all city workshops and planned adequate inventory levels through effective inventory replenishment and JIT inventory model . • Established control tower operations for monitoring daily part procurement TAT, logistics TAT , intercity and regular inventory receiving TAT . • Managed to maintain inventory hygiene and accuracy at 99% through daily cycle count followed by RCA and closure. 02/2020 – 09/2022 ASSISTANT MANAGER - SUPPLY CHAIN OPERATION , DELHIVERY Managed warehouse operations for clients - Swiggy (FMCG), Twenty-four Seven (FMCG) & Hitachi (White Goods). SWIGGY INSTAMART - • Managed 11 warehouses with a total area of 12 Lacs Sq.ft. • Performed major activities like - inventory layout planning and control as per the FSN and pareto analysis (ABC Analysis), manpower planning, logistics planning, improving productivity and solving operational challenges. • Continuously tracking warehouse metrics like IPP, fill rate and working on improving overall efficiency through techniques like TMS. • Single point of contact for the client (Swiggy Instamart) from operations side, responsible for timely response and resolution of any kind of concern, query, and escalation. TWENTY-FOUR SEVEN - • Successfully launched and managed Twenty-Four Seven warehouse spread in 50,000 Sq. ft and which fulfilled to 110 stores across Delhi NCR and Punjab . • Led transportation from the front and saved on fleet cost by means of dynamic route 2 planning and optimally using the vehicles wherever possible. • Improved returns process and tracking method, by which was able to monitor reverse GIT effectively and track returns movement. • Introduced new and effective methods to reduce damage and pilferage. • Improved packaging methods and introduced reusable box/crate polythene bags which resulted in cost saving to the company both in terms of workforce and resource cost. • Daily & monthly cycle count resulted in minimizing the overall inventory variance. Daily working on Short Pick and PNF resulted in maintaining the inventory accuracy. HITACHI SPARES - Successfully launched and managed Hitachi spares warehouse . 01/2019 – 12/2019 PROCUREMENT -OPERATIONS EXECUTIVE , BIZONGO • Managed to develop new vendors for various categories as per the client’s requirement . • Aggressively pushed and followed up production to run the aged inventory thus reducing aged inventory from 40% to 10%. • Managed to contain inventory days within 20-25 days for different clients. • Successfully executed the production plans and maintained adequate inventory during the year-end sale for marketplace clients. 05/2018 – 05/2018 MANAGEMENT INTERN, TVS LOGISTICS • Managed warehouse operations. • Defined various KPI’s for Amway warehouse, Barota, Sonipat. • Analyzed customer complaints at Amway warehouse. 06/2016 - 08/2016 MANAGEMENT INTERN, AIRPORTS AUTHORITY OF INDIA, NEW DELHI. • Worked in Performance Appraisal and Reporting Cell (HR Dept). • Maintained the records of the grading/points given to the employees by the immediate supervisors. • Managed the records of the employees with the help of SAP Data.
